name: v1_convert
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hryvna_today.
Tool description: Exchange rates from Hryvna Today
API description: Converts a sum of money from one currency to another using the specified conversion type and RapidAPI key.

to.description: The currency ID to convert to.

sum.description: The sum of money to convert.

is_from.description: The currency ID to convert from.

type.description: The type of conversion, defaults to 'commercial'.
